name: Tentacle Manor
description:
When you woke up, you found yourself In a manor.
A manor where cursed creatures and evil tentacles swagger like in their hell, always hungry and eager for lust.
Keep away from those monsters and find out truth of the manor.
Will you be able to escape? Fail and abandon yourself? Or - accept evil that thrives in the manor?
2D platformer with animated pixel graphics
Protagonist does not have fighting methods, so you will have to avoid enemies to progress
11 different enemies with unique animated sex scenes
3 different endings
Extra mode where you can watch unlocked hentai scenes
